title: We were right to say that crime is not declining in Britain - claim researchers ...
text: ( Source : Teesside University ) Criminologists at Teesside University say the inclusion of cyber-offences in official crime statistics provided by the Crime Survey of England and Wales proves that repeated claims of a fall in crime have long
